title: ‘Law and Order’ Adds ‘Star Trek: Discovery’ Alum David Ajala as Series Regular for Season 25
summary: David Ajala has been cast in “Law and Order” Season 25 in a series regular role. Ajala will play a detective alongside Det. Vincent Reilly (Reid Scott). Additional Season 25 cast members include Tony Goldwyn, Maura Tierney, Odelya Halevi, and Hugh Dancy. Ajala is best known for playing Cleveland “B…
